009package imagingbook.sampleimages;
010
011import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
012
013/**
014 * Enumeration defining a set of {@link ImageResource} objects associated
015 * with RANSAC test images.
016 * @see ImageResource
017 * @see GeneralTestImage
018 */
019public enum RansacTestImage implements ImageResource {
020        
021        NoisyLines("noisy-lines.png"), 
022        NoisyCircles("noisy-circles.png"), 
023        NoisyEllipses("noisy-ellipses.png");
024        
025        private final String filename;
026        
027        RansacTestImage(String filename) {
028                this.filename = filename;
029        }
030        
031        @Override
032        public String getFileName() {
033                return filename;
034        }
035}
